tenantPayments.title: Rent Payment
tenantPayments.paymentSuccess: Your rent payment has been recorded and the receipt has been automatically downloaded.
tenantPayments.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields (Date, Amount and Payment Method).
tenantPayments.receiptGenerated: A PDF receipt will be automatically downloaded after validation of full payment.
tenantPayments.noReceiptPartial: No receipt will be generated for partial or excess payment.
tenantPayments.paymentBefore5th: • Payment must be made before the 5th of each month
tenantPayments.enterExactAmount: • Enter the exact amount you are paying
tenantPayments.receiptFullPayment: • A PDF receipt will be generated only for full payments
tenantPayments.alertDifferentAmount: • In case of different amount, an alert will be raised
